hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Mas`ud:The Prophet (ﷺ) recited Surat an-Najm (53) at Mecca and prostrated while reciting it and those who were with him did the same except an old man who took a handful of small stones or earth and lifted it to his forehead and said, "This is sufficient for me." Later on, I saw him killed as a non-believer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سُجُودِ الْقُرْآنِ وَسُنَّتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Prostrations during the recitation of the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:On Fridays the Prophet (ﷺ) used to recite Alif Lam Mim Tanzil-As-Sajda (in the first rak`a) and Hal ata `alal-insani i.e. Surat ad-Dahr (LXXVI) (in the second rak`a), in the Fajr prayer

chapter.eng-name: To prostrate during the recitation of Salat Tanzil - As-Sajda (No. 32)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The prostration of Sa`d is not a compulsory one but I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) prostrating while reciting it

chapter.eng-name: To prostrate while reciting Surat Sad (No. 38)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Mas`ud:The Prophet (ﷺ) recited Surat-an-Najm (53) and prostrated while reciting it and all the people prostrated and a man amongst the people took a handful of stones or earth and raised it to his face and said, "This is sufficient for me." Later on I saw him killed as a non-believer
Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) prostrated while reciting An-Najm and with him prostrated the Muslims, the pagans, the jinns, and all human beings

chapter.eng-name: The prostrattion of Muslims along with Al-Mushrikun; and a Mushrik is Najasun (impure) and does not perform ablution;

hadiths.text: Narrated `Ata' bin Yasar:I asked Zaid bin Thabit about prostration on which he said that he had recited An-Najm before the Prophet, yet he (the Prophet) had not performed a prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَرَأَ السَّجْدَةَ وَلَمْ يَسْجُدْ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever recited the verses of prostration and did not prostrate

hadiths.text: Narrated Zaid bin Thabit:I recited An-Najm before the Prophet, yet he did not perform a prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَرَأَ السَّجْدَةَ وَلَمْ يَسْجُدْ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever recited the verses of prostration and did not prostrate

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Salama:I saw Abu Huraira reciting Idha-Sama' un-Shaqqat and he prostrated during its recitation. I asked Abu Huraira, "Didn't I see you prostrating?" Abu Huraira said, "Had I not seen the Prophet (ﷺ) prostrating, I would not have prostrated

Narrated Ibn `Umar:When the Prophet (ﷺ) recited a Sura that contained the prostration he would prostrate and we would do the same and some of us (because of the heavy rush) could not find a place for prostration

chapter.eng-name: Whoever prostrated with the prostration of the reciter

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:When the Prophet (ﷺ) recited Surat As-Sajda and we were with him, he would prostrate and we also would prostrate with him and some of us (because of the heavy rush) would not find a place (for our foreheads) to prostrate on

chapter.ara-name: باب ازْدِحَامِ النَّاسِ إِذَا قَرَأَ الإِمَامُ السَّجْدَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The overcrowding of the people when the Imam recites As-Sajda

hadiths.text: Narrated Rabi`a:`Umar bin Al-Khattab recited Surat-an-Nahl on a Friday on the pulpit and when he reached the verse of Sajda he got down from the pulpit and prostrated and the people also prostrated. The next Friday `Umar bin Al-Khattab recited the same Sura and when he reached the verse of Sajda he said, "O people! When we recite the verses of Sajda (during the sermon) whoever prostrates does the right thing, yet it is no sin for the one who does not prostrate." And `Umar did not prostrate (that day). Added Ibn `Umar "Allah has not made the prostration of recitation compulsory but if we wish we can do it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رَأَى أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ لَمْ يُوجِبِ السُّجُودَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever thinks that Allah has not made prostration of recitation compulsory

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Rafi`:I offered the `Isha' prayer behind Abu Huraira and he recited Idhas-Sama' Un-Shaqqat, and prostrated. I said, "What is this?" Abu Huraira said, "I prostrated behind Abul-Qasim and I will do the same till I meet him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَرَأَ السَّجْدَةَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فَسَجَدَ بِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Whoever recited the Verse of Sajda during the Salat (prayer) and prostrated

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar.:Whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) recited the Sura which contained the prostration of recitation he used to prostrate and then we too, would prostrate and some of us did not find a place for prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَجِدْ مَوْضِعًا لِلسُّجُودِ مِنَ الزِّحَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever does not find a place for prostration (with the Imam) because of overcrowding
